mapper.select: select * from dlink_job_instance where id = #{id} limit 1
select a.status, count(1) as counts from dlink_job_instance a inner join ( select max(ji.id) as id from dlink_job_instance ji group by ji.task_id ) snap on snap.id = a.id group by status
select status, count(1) as counts from dlink_job_instance group by status
select * from dlink_job_instance where status not in ('FAILED', 'CANCELED', 'FINISHED', 'UNKNOWN') order by id desc
